steward_approvals.reason: Security documents were in wrong directory (docs/standards/security/) and using wrong number range (106-109). Moved to docs/security/ and renumbered to proper 400-499 range to resolve structural inconsistency and numbering conflicts.

governance_rules.sequence_validation: Must check registry before creation and validate against directory ranges
governance_rules.range_enforcement: Sequence numbers must comply with directory-specific ranges
governance_rules.approval_logging: All approvals must be logged with reasoning

audit_trail.major_restructuring: 2025-08-19: Security documents moved and renumbered, range enforcement implemented
